channel.title: CiTR -- Third Time's The Charm
channel.description: Open your ears and prepare yourself for a shock! These are delinquent youth gone berserk! Deadlier than the most dangerous criminal! Hear this menacing scourge that is Rock 'N' Roll!
channel.itunes:summary: Open your ears and prepare yourself for a shock! These are delinquent youth gone berserk! Deadlier than the most dangerous criminal! Hear this menacing scourge that is Rock 'N' Roll!
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hear this menacing scourge that is Rock 'N' Roll!

item.title: May 24 2011
item.description: kaminari attack! he's here tomorrow night @ The Biltmore! tune in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Guitar Wolf's The Charm

item.title: May 17 2011
item.description: good times this Sunday @ The Waldorf and a trbiute of sorts to Joey Ramone...new jams from Mother's Children, First Base and more! whew!
item.itunes:subtitle: Wyrd Fest III's The Charm

item.title: May 3 2011
item.description: whew...shaky start to begin, but we pulled it together for a feature on this great Danish duo appearing May 14 @ Venue. hope you enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Raveonettes Are The Charm

item.title: April 26 2011
item.description: whoa nelly! new jams from Shannon & The Clams, Jonny, C'mon and more-RIP Poly Styrene of X-Ray Spex
item.itunes:subtitle: We Are Rockin' The Charm Today

item.title: April 19 2011
item.description: their galactic debut CD today on the show-it's a gas!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Vicious Cycles Are The Charm

item.title: April 12 2011
item.description: a few nuggets of greatness from the Chicago label today as well as new B-Lines, Vivian Girls, and much more! check it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hozac Records Are The Charm

item.title: April 5 2011
item.description: indeed! Something Fierce, Those Darlins, Hunx and his Punx, Raveonettes, No Problem and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Lots of New Jams Are The Charm

item.title: March 29 2011
item.description: lots of good jams today from Bass Drum Of Death, the Jolts, The Matadors, Natural Child, The Vibrating Beds and much more! dig it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Feeling Good's The Charm

item.title: Marc 22 2011
item.description: well lots going on today-a little talk about Screeching Weasel, new jam from the Cute Lepers, some big concert news and we shimmy-shaked to Mr Fine Wine's latest R&B and Soul stomp!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Little Rant and a Dance Is The Charm

item.title: March 15 2011
item.description: a preview of the upcoming comp from Mammoth Cave, some holdovers from our Int'l Women's Day show and more today-dig in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bloodstains Across BC's The Charm

item.title: March 8 2011
item.description: Happy Int'l Women's Day! lotsa ladies who rock and/or roll today-enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Ladies Are The Charm

item.title: March 1 2011
item.description: pretty exciting news on the show today, plus a new jam from Obits and heaps more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Rock 'N' Roll Music's The Charm

item.title: February 22 2011
item.description: our favourite spacemen return to Earth this Friday Feb.25 @ The Biltmore-see you there earthlings!
item.itunes:subtitle: Man..Or Astro-Man's The Charm

item.title: February 15 2011
item.description: a look at this pioneering post-punk group today in advance of their show @ Venue-hope you like!
item.itunes:subtitle: Gang Of Four's The Charm

item.title: Febraury 8 2011
item.description: we pay our respects to the buxom beauty today as well as play you the rock and roll...have a listen, won't you?
item.itunes:subtitle: Tura Satana's The Charm

item.title: February 1 2011
item.description: not THAT kind of bender silly, the Slabtown Bender in Portland Feb.4-6...we played some of the acts who will be there on the show today. as well, new jams from The Dirtbombs, Meisha & the Spanks, the Smith Westerns and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Going On A Bender's The Charm

item.title: January 25 2011
item.description: new stuff from Kill City, Fergus & Geronimo, Tandoori Knights and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Just Getting By's The Charm

item.title: January 18 2011
item.description:
email borninsixtynine@hotmail.com for your chance to win tix to their show May 8 @ The Commodore. riddle me this: what other band has Kills singer also done time in lately? if you know the answer you win!
also check out Needles/Pins 7: release party Sat. Jan 22 @ The Astoria!!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Kills Are The Charm

item.title: January 11 2011
item.description: heya! glad to see you...new jams from The Beladeans, Syl Johnson, The Weirdies and a lot more!
item.itunes:subtitle: First Show Of The New Year's The Charm

item.title: December 28 2010
item.description: enjoy the mix and dance your way into 2011!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Year End Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party's The Charm

item.title: December 21 2010
item.description: HO HO HO! HAVE A MERRY CHRISTMAS! Christmas tunes to fill your stocking full today!
item.itunes:subtitle: Spreading Some Christmas Cheer's The Charm

item.title: November 30 2010
item.description: interviews with Bob & Janelle and Michael on today's show!! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mongrel Zine vs. Michael Rault's The Charm

item.title: November 23 2010
item.description:
keep CiTR on the air! pledge your support to 604.822.8648 or donate on-line (www.citr.ca/donate)
Bob Scott artwork is up for grabs on the CiTR website (www.citr.ca)-check it out along with other great incentives!
thanks for all the support!
item.itunes:subtitle: Funding Drive's The Charm Part 2

item.title: November 16 2010
item.description:
donate now!! 604.822.8648 or www.citr.ca/donate
i'm giving away lots of cool stuff! thanks!
item.itunes:subtitle: Funding Drive's The Charm

item.title: November 9 2010
item.description: get ready to pledge! 604.822.8648 or www.citr.ca/donate
item.itunes:subtitle: One More Week 'Til Funding Drive's The Charm

item.title: November 2 2010
item.description: lots of good jams from the likes of Fear Of Lipstick, The Ugly Beats, Fresh & Onlys, Melvin Davis and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mostly New Tunes Are The Charm

item.title: October 26 2010
item.description: get ready for fright! bone-chilling terror! spooks and ghouls! enter if you dare!
item.itunes:subtitle: Our Halloween Spooktacular's The Charm

item.title: October 19 2010
item.description: a truly mixed bag today, no rhyme no reason, just because!
item.itunes:subtitle: Anything Goes Is The Charm

item.title: October 12 2010
item.description: a legend of soul passes us by this week, a little tribute for him starts off the show. then we had some new goodies from Fitz & the Tantrums, Fist City and Shi Yi among others-enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Solomon Burke's The Charm

item.title: October 5 2010
item.description: a little profile of the man, the myth, the legend as he returns to set the stage ablaze on Thurs Oct.7 @ New Brandiz! we played some other songs too.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark Sultan's The Charm

item.title: September 28 2010
item.description: we feel bad you can't go to the Scion Garage Fest in Lawrence Kansas this weekend, so we brought you a live session the Memphis creeps recorded for WFMU on Cherry Blossom Clinic-smell the magic!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Oblivian's Are The Charm

item.title: September 21 2010
item.description: aah yes...that's much better than last week now isn't it? new psychedelia, cool new local jams, a look at the Edmonton scene and a long lost artifact from the fist wave of Ireland punk circa '77-it's all here!
item.itunes:subtitle: Redemption's The Charm

item.title: September 14 2010
item.description: aaagh! too much stress this morning made for a sub-par show...hope you listen anyway.
item.itunes:subtitle: Being Super Late and Angry's The Charm

item.title: September 7 2010
item.description: hey ho let's go! lots of tunes to kick the back to school blues-listen up!
item.itunes:subtitle: Back To School's The Charm

item.title: August 31 2010
item.description: ugly outside but rockin' inside-the show was full of good tunes...take a listen!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Soggy Day's The Charm

item.title: August 24 2010
item.description: a good chunk of them today on the show, plus a look at the latest Off The Hip Records roster and lots more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Girl Group's Are The Charm

item.title: August 17 2010
item.description: who's going to see them in Portland? i'm jealous, thank you very much.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Mummies Are The Charm

item.title: August 10 2010
item.description: whew...almost didn't get out of bed this morning after the dance party madness of Ice Cream Social, but i made it and made up for lost time with some great tracks-listen for yourselves!!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Morning After the Night Before's The Charm

item.title: August 3 2010
item.description: you know it! enjoy some summer-themed tunes courtesy of yours truly!
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer Songs Are The Charm

item.title: July 20 2010
item.description: -a little family tree of Obits/Night Marchers tunes today, as well as other debuts from Peach Kelli Pop, the Tijuana Panthers and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Feeling Good's The Charm

item.title: July 13 2010
item.description: just wait, it's coming...new tunes from Miss Chain & The Broken Heels, The Hives, The Biters, Knee Jerk Reactions and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hanging Around's The Charm

item.title: July 6 2010
item.description: yes indeed, and some songs to get you in the mood-new stuff from Magic Kids, Wavvves, Tame Impala and many more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer's Here Is The Charm

item.title: June 29 2010
item.description: a whole heap of Cancon goodness today-enjoy it, eh?
item.itunes:subtitle: Being Mostly Canadian Content's The Charm

item.title: June 22 2010
item.description: debuted their brand new record today-check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: White Lung's The Charm

item.title: June 15 2010
item.description: yep little late today but it's all good-check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Short & Sweet's The Charm

item.title: June 1 2010
item.description: June 2-5 2010 musicwaste.ca check it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Music Waste's The Charm

item.title: May 25 2010
item.description: the songs this hard-working Brooklyn combo taught us today along with some other bits and pieces! rock!
item.itunes:subtitle: The A-Bones Are The Charm

item.title: May 18 2010
item.description: it was thirty years ago today...
item.itunes:subtitle: Ian Curtis' The Charm

item.title: May 11 2010
item.description: today's show was massive! i'm exhausted...but we had a good time chronicling the two most important films about Vancouver you'll see this year and one of the most influential live bands you'll hear. enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Being Fucked Up, Bloodied But Unbowed In A No Fun City's The Charm

item.title: May 4 2010
item.description: songs this Minneapolis power-pop trio taught us today-class is in session!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Fever's The Charm

item.title: April 27 2010
item.description: bought some new tracks today from Midnight Callers, Mother's Children and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: End Of April's the Charm

item.title: April 20 2010
item.description: back from my road trip down the coast w/ new jams from White Wires, Happy Birthday,Let's Wrestle, Mark Sultan and much more! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Back In The Saddle's The Charm

item.title: April 6 2010
item.description: lots of rock and roll to keep you indoors and out of the rain! tune in and stay dry!
item.itunes:subtitle: April Shower's The Charm

item.title: March 30 2010
item.description: well well well here are are once again...new jams from The Stolen Minks, Holly Golightly, City Sweethearts and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Business As Usual's The Charm

item.title: March 23 2010
item.description: a tribute to a lost legend today, enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex Chilton's The Charm

item.title: March 16 2010
item.description: what a show-new Mean Jeans, Splinters, Harlem, so much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Spring is The Charm

item.title: March 9 2010
item.description: what's good, people? i tell you-this show!
item.itunes:subtitle: Doing Alright's The Charm

item.title: March 2 2010
item.description: the dust has settled in the city but we kick it up with new tracks from Regulations, Digger & The Pussycats, Bad Sports, and more!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Done With the Olympics' The Charm

item.title: February 16 2010
item.description: that's right folks, getting outta dodge this week but not before leaving you with some ace tunes from the likes of The Soft Pack, Hockey Dad Records comp and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Escaping the Madness Is the Charm

item.title: February 9 2010
item.description: songs about TV today. listen carefully!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Boob Tube's The Charm

item.title: February 2 2010
item.description: are you going? you should...proof is in today's show!
item.itunes:subtitle: Slabtown Bender's The Charm

item.title: January 26 2010
item.description: new tracks from The Len Price 3, Statues, some new Austin bands to check out and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: The End Of The Month's The Charm

item.title: January 19 2010
item.description: another great one gone...
item.itunes:subtitle: R.I.P. Jay Reatard

item.title: January 5 2010
item.description: my fave 7" rekkids of '09 and a smattering of new jams. dig it.
item.itunes:subtitle: A New Year and a Look Back's The Charm

item.title: December 29 2009
item.description:
that's right kids! get ready to stomp shout and work it on out!
ROMANTICS-gimme one more chance LYRES-you won't be sad anymore UNTAMED YOUTH-mailbox jamboree SAM THE SHAM & THE PHAROAHS-ring dang doo LES SEXAREENOS-don't you know yokomo KINGSMEN-j.a.j. SWINGIN' NECKBREAKERS-i'm in love with me NEATBEATS-beatific morning STRANGELOVES-cara-lin HERMAN'S HERMITS-for love MCCOYS-fever FONDAS-make you mine DAVILA 666-callejon KING KHAN & BBQ SHOW-animal party BO DIDDLEY-bo's twist A.C. REED-boogaloo tramp ARTWOODS-don't you cry no more MIDNITERS-whittier blvd LARRY WILLIAMS-whole lotta shaking going on DOUG SAHM-slow down MACH KUNG FU-bamboo twist TRASHMEN-tube city VENTURES-wild action NEANDERTHALS-street cleaner THE BEAT-u.s.a NIKKI CORVETTE-he's a mover RAMONES-do you wanna dance? UNDERTONES-hypnotized CUTE LEPERS-opening up SETTING SON-the setting son THEE MANIPULATORS-brass tax STROLLERS-you'll never see me again FLAMING SIDEBURNS-blow the roof MARK & THE SPIES-hers to keep MIDWAYS-she loves me HI-FIVES-conversations like these SEARCHERS-love potion no.9 TELSTARS-you've got to leave BETTYE SWANN-lonely love OTIS SMITH-let her go
item.itunes:subtitle: A Year End Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party's The Charm

item.title: December 22 2009
item.description: getting in the holiday spirit today with some Christmas tunes-enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Ho Ho Ho Is The Charm

item.title: December 15 2009
item.description: pulled out some new Vapid, Regulations, Willowz and Riptides along with the usual assortment of goodies you've come to expect!
item.itunes:subtitle: A New Bag of Tricks Is The Charm

item.title: December 8 2009
item.description: the music of burlesque to warm things up today! R.I.P. Greg Johnson of the Fiends
item.itunes:subtitle: A Little Bit of Tease Is The Charm

item.title: December 1 2009
item.description: at least we had some wicked debuts today from The Cute Lepers, Tvees, Sonic Avenues and more! dig in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Being Sick's Not The Charm

item.title: November 24 2009
item.description: Funding Drive week 2 w/ King Khan live in studio!
item.itunes:subtitle: King Khan & BBQ Show's The Charm

item.title: November 17 2009
item.description:
the ladies crump it out live today for Funding Drive show #1!
donate on-line www.citr.ca/donate!!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Pack AD's The Charm

item.title: November 10 2009
item.description: highlighted the horror-punk kings on the heels on their show tonight Nov.10 @ Venue!!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Misfits Are The Charm

item.title: November 3 2009
item.description: just like the title says folks! more new tracks than you can shake a stick at!
item.itunes:subtitle: All New For November's The Charm

item.title: October 27 2009
item.description: Bob and Janelle make a return visit to plug Mongrel Zine #7 and we also throw in some spooky Halloween fun!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mongrel's Zine's The Charm Again

item.title: October 20 2009
item.description: 28 years later, The Slits release their new record Trapped Animal to the world. also a quick recap of the Scion Garage Fest!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Slits Are The Charm

item.title: October 13 2009
item.description: our extended show features some of the acts playing at this one day blowout in Portland! check out scion.com/garagefest for more deets!
item.itunes:subtitle: Scion Garage Fest's The Charm

item.title: October 6 2009
item.description: highlighted this garage trio's output as they are coming to Vancouver Oct.11 @ The Commodore, supporting Juliette Lewis-don't miss it!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Ette's Are The Charm

item.title: September 29 2009
item.description: don't miss 'em Saturday Oct.3 @ The Biltmore! played some new stuff from The Raveonettes, The Reverberators and ruminated on Fucked Up's Polaris Prize win...
item.itunes:subtitle: Dutchess & The Duke's The Charm

item.title: September 22 2009
item.description: its a busy week and a busy month for rock and roll shows so we talk about a bunch of them. also we debut new tracks from The Almighty Defenders, The Dutchess & The Duke and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Ton of Good Shows's The Charm

item.title: September 15 2009
item.description: lotsa brand new stuff today-King Khan & BBQ Show, The Action, Vivian Girls and more more more! tune in!
item.itunes:subtitle: New Jams Are The Charm

item.title: September 8 2009
item.description: class is in session! school songs and the songs that the Woggles AND Gories taught us today! pop quiz later...
item.itunes:subtitle: Back To School's The Charm

item.title: Sept 1 2009
item.description: songs that Mr. Greg O taught us today on the program, to celebrate the release of The Reigning Sound's new opus, Love & Curses...bunch of Calgary rock and roll and some odds and sods too.
item.itunes:subtitle: Greg Cartwright's The Charm

item.title: August 25 2009
item.description: just like the name suggests...but including new sounds from the Box Elders, Rich Hope and The Setting Son among others!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixing Things Up's The Charm

item.title: August 11 2009
item.description: bad news travels fast with some of our favourite local acts falling victim to losing members and gear! but we did provide good times with new tracks from Jay Reatard, The Vivian Girls, The Fucking Eagles and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Local Band Woe's The Charm

item.title: August 4 2009
item.description: a preview of this great fest in Montreal-damn i wish i was going!
item.itunes:subtitle: Wooly Weekend's The Charm

item.title: July 28 2009
item.description: Show Swap week w/Becky (with help from Shannon & Norm) rocking the tunes this morning!
item.itunes:subtitle: This Side Of Monday's The Charm

item.title: July 21 2009
item.description: big show this Thursday @ The Commodore so we spun a whole heap of tracks...enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Black Lips Are The Charm

item.title: July 14 2009
item.description: a brief history of this 30 year old band as they hit the Commodore Ballroom for two nights this weekend. other new tracks from The Rippers, The Bon and Les Terribles too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Social Distortion's The Charm

item.title: July 7 2009
item.description: seriously, what happened? hello summer are you there? no matter...we got some good jams from the likes of The Volcanics, Suspect Parts, Woven Bones, Deep Sleep among others...tune in and rock out!
item.itunes:subtitle: No More Rain's The Charm

item.title: June 30 2009
item.description: whew! ears still ringing from last night's insane KK & BBQ show, but we ripped through the program with tributes to Sky Saxon AND Bob Bogle, and chatted w/ Rik Collins about the show in Vancouver! listen up!
item.itunes:subtitle: Woolly Bandits The Charm

item.title: June 23 2009
item.description: a bit of a report from my travels to Toronto, but some new jams from the likes of Johnny Throttle, The Omens, Golden Triangle and Those Darlins-it's summertime baby!
item.itunes:subtitle: NXNE's The Charm

item.title: June 16 2009
item.description: we spend most of today profiling everyone's favourite rabble-rouser and musician-hope you like!
item.itunes:subtitle: Jay Reatard's The Charm

item.title: June 9 2009
item.description: big preview of what's a-happening around town this week!check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Music Waste's The Charm

item.title: June 2 2009
item.description: all over the map today-Dolly Rocker Movement, Black Lips, The Superstitions, JC Brooks & The Uptown Sound...you get the idea. listen up!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Mixed Bag's The Charm

item.title: May 26 2009
item.description: wouldn't you know it, i take a week off and the rust settles in...haha...well,we still managed a great show w /new tracks from the Andrew WK/Evaporators new 7", The Pink Fits and Liechtenstein among others! dive in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm Indeed!

item.title: May 12 2009
item.description: that's right kids, today is the day! but first, you have to listen to this show 'cuz we played tracks from Crocodiles, Wau Y Los Arrghs! and The Old Wives to get you in the mood! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Voting Day's The Charm

item.title: May 5 2009
item.description: we kick off the month of May with hot new jams from The Fresh & Onlys, Jack-o & The Tennessee Tearjerkers, New York Dolls, and a blisterin' version of a Motorhead classic by white boy soul sensation Eli "Paperboy" Reed that has to be heard to be believed! lots more in store so dig in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cinco De Mayo's The Charm

item.title: April 28 2009
item.description: Bob and Janelle from Mongrel Zine stop by to chat about the new issue, spin some records, and cause a commotion! listen in, won't you?
item.itunes:subtitle: Mongrel Zine's The Charm

item.title: April 21 2009
item.description: great label from Chicago featured today as well as brand new jams from The Datsuns, King Khan & the Shrines, Petroleum By Products and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tic Tac Totally's The Charm

item.title: April 14 2009
item.description: holy COW is there ever a lot going on this week, but if nothing else, SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL INDEPENDENT RECORD STORE SATURDAY APRIL 18!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Record Store Day's The Charm

item.title: April 07 2009
item.description: what a way to celebrate than to catch the return of Van City's much beloved The Spitfires? and you've got two chances! Fri. Apr. 10 @ Surrey's Amber Jack Pub and Sun. Apr. 12 @ The Cobalt...do it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Easter Weekend's The Charm

item.title: March 31 2009
item.description: a memorial to a fallen musical soldier to start off today, but then we pick things up with new stuff from Los Explosivos, The Coathangers and The Horrors, along with a preview of The Bronx show happening Apr.1 @ Dick's...mmmm good.
item.itunes:subtitle: Travis Criscola's The Charm

item.title: March 24 2009
item.description: cool stuff from the nation's capital today as well as new jams from The Gris Gris, Adjective and the "world premier" of the posthumous second album by The Nasty On! word!
item.itunes:subtitle: Capital City's The Charm

item.title: March 17 2009
item.description: we play some of the songs this frat rock superpower taught us as well as new stuff from The Strange Boys, The Tunnel, Obits and more! Happy Birthday Ruby!
item.itunes:subtitle: Untamed Youth's The Charm

item.title: March 10 2009
item.description: our womens only show today, lots of cool r'n'r', punk, soul and pop for your listening pleasure! whoa mama!
item.itunes:subtitle: This One's For The Ladies!

item.title: March 3 2009
item.description: everything from garage blues to new psychedelia to merseybeat and back again with the likes of The Speaking Tongues, Mark & the Spies, Spindrift and Love Boat to name a few. dig in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixing It Up's The Charm

item.title: February 24 2009
item.description: live set from the Atlanta foursome played today courtesy of WFMU and The Cherry Blossom Clinic! some other stuff too...won't you listen, please?
item.itunes:subtitle: Gentleman Jesse's The Charm

item.title: February 17 2009
item.description: a nod to Estelle Bennett of The Ronettes today, plus new stuff from The Flips, Dex Romweber Duo among others and a ton of show info!
item.itunes:subtitle: Being Back On Track's The Charm

item.title: February 10 2009
item.description: a tribute to the seminal psychobilly band today as well as a preview of the Murder City Devils return to Van City this Friday the 13th!
item.itunes:subtitle: Lux Interior's The Charm

item.title: January 27 2009
item.description: a live set from the studios of WFMU and the Cherry Blossom Clinic radio show today...amazing stuff! also new Black Lips, Spitfires and mucho grande rock and/or roll!
item.itunes:subtitle: Magic Christian's The Charm

item.title: January 20 2009
item.description: damn you and your cool fests Portland, Oregon! we also played a set from the Nouvellas (courtesy of The Pat Duncan show on WFMU) as well as the usual jams! whoop whoop!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dmmr Bmmr's The Charm

item.title: January 13 2009
item.description: they're baaaaaaaaack! and they played in the studios of WFMU on the Cherry Blossom Clinic radio show whic hwe played a bit of today. also , a tip o' the hat to Ron Asheton and new jams from Ty Segall, Thee Vicars and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Boss Hog's The Charm

item.title: January 6 2009
item.description: hot new stuff from the Kneejerk Reactions, The Marked Men, Teen Anger and a whole lot more! dig in!
item.itunes:subtitle: The New Year's The Charm

item.title: December 30 2008
item.description:
a rock and roll dance party like none other! here's what we played:
VON ZIPPERS-skip to my mary jane KAISERS-don't come back WOGGLES-push SATAN'S PILGRIMS-frankenstomp GRUESOMES-you gotta believe me SWINGIN' NECKBREAKERS-live for buzz SATELLITERS-wher do we go? CYNICS-yeah CHESSMEN-you can't catch me LYRES-i can tell MAKERS-look both ways MUMMIES-die! KING COLEMAN-hang it up DON GARDENER-my baby like to boogaloo STANDELLS-little sally tease MIDNITERS-i found a peanut BABY HUEY & THE BABYSITTERS-monkey man OLYMPICS-hully gully RUFUS THOMAS-memphis train SONICS-have love will travel MOONEY SUZUKI-half of my heart (INTERNATIONAL) NOISE CONSPIRACY-black mask DETROIT COBRAS-i'll keep holding on REIGNING SOUND-we repel each other DEADLY SNAKES-i can't sleep at night RED ONIONS-gimme some more FLASH EXPRESS-movin' it JON SPENCER BLUES EXPLOSION-afro BLUE VAN-i want you MAGGOTS-i wanna go home DONNAS-friends like mine DANKO JONES-strut HIVES-tick tick boom KING KHAN & BBQ SHOW-fish fight FLARES-foot stompin' BOB & EARL-harlem shuffle LARRY WILLIAMS-baby SPENCER DAVIS GROUP-keep on running MTICH RYDER & THE DETROIT WHEELS-a face in the crowd KINKS-i need you GREENHORNES-can't stand it HATEBOMBS-woah!
i'm tired, how 'bout you?
item.itunes:subtitle: The End Of The Year's The Charm

item.title: December 23 2008
item.description: we get in the festive spirit this week-any questions?
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas Time's The Charm

item.title: December 16 2008
item.description: a tribute to the recently deceased icon as well as a preview of some top-notch shows coming in the new year and a live set from Cheap Time on WFMU! whew!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bettie Page's The Charm

item.title: December 9 2008
item.description: the likes of The Hall Monitors, Paul Collins Beat and Margaret Thrasher were played today along with the usual assortment of rock and/or roll. yep, that's it.
item.itunes:subtitle: New Jams Are The Charm

item.title: December 2 2008
item.description: or at least what you've come to expect from this trainwreck we call a radio show. new jams from The Points, Suzy Y Los Quatros, Maximum Rock And Roll as well as a fascination with the mid-nineties...
item.itunes:subtitle: Returning To Normal's The Charm

item.title: November 25 2008
item.description: funding drive show #2! thanks for your donations! spotlight w/ Holly performing tonight @ The Biltmore!
item.itunes:subtitle: Holly Golightly's The Charm

item.title: November 18 2008
item.description: call 604.822.8648 to donate! every bit helps!
item.itunes:subtitle: Funding Drive's The Charm

item.title: November 11 2008
item.description: we pay tribute to this R&B/soul legend as well as debut new tracks from The HaraKeeRees, Lords Of Altamont and Electric Frankenstein! play loud!
item.itunes:subtitle: Nathaniel Mayer's The Charm

item.title: November 4 2008
item.description: that's right kids-we're gonna shake real low Friday Nov.7 @ The Biltmore...new jams from Shannon & The Clams, Chocolat, Holly Golightly & the Brokeoffs and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: King Khan & BBQ's The Charm

item.title: October 28 2008
item.description: GUITAR WOLF-planet of the wolves CHESTERFIELD KINGS-expo 2000 TIKI MEN-theme from the unknown NOMADS-the way you touch my hand HEADCOATS-thoughts of a hangman DESTRUCTION UNIT-day of your death VON BONDIES-sound of terror GENE MOSS-surf monster ESSEX-cemetary stomp SCOTT ENGEL-devil surfer PANDORAS-haunted beach party WEIRDOS-jack the ripper IMPALA-hell of a woman LAZY COWGIRLS-teenage frankenstein WEIRDIES-frankenstein's daughter DANIEL JOHNSTON & JAD FAIR-frankenstein conquers the world NOTHING PAINTED BLUE-(i'm a) haunted house FLESHEATERS-satan's stomp NEANDERTHALS-man from mars VENTURES-fourth dimension SLICKEE BOYS-the brain that wouldn't die NIGHT KINGS-psychosis BLOWTOPS-floorboard DEAD MOON-evil eye MATADORS-the evil eye CREEPSHOW-run for your life UNKNOWN-i'm a ghost DON HINSON & THE RIGORMORTICIANS-phantom of the go-go P.XAVIER ATENCIO & BUDDY BAKER-grim grinning ghosts GUN CLUB-ghost on the highway SICK THINGS-sleeping with the dead SPOOKS-the spook walks LAMBERT, HEDRICKS & ROSS-halloween spooks
item.itunes:subtitle: Halloween Spooktacular!

item.title: October 21 2008
item.description: a mini-feature on the late Frankie Venom, plus the passing of "Dolemite", a preview of Budget Rock 7, and new jams from The Safes, Baby Woodrose and others! whoa man!
item.itunes:subtitle: Teenage Head's The Charm

item.title: October 14 2008
item.description: a feature on the seminal post-punk band in preparation for their Thursday gig @ The Commodore dominates today...hope you dig!
item.itunes:subtitle: Wire's The Charm

item.title: October 7 2008
item.description: new stuff from The Nodzzz, Baby Shakes, Henry Fiat's Open Sore and more! tour tribulations from The Pack AD...and a twelve hour show from Fucked Up? that's...fucked up!
item.itunes:subtitle: Being On The Road's The Charm

item.title: September 30 2008
item.description: we play Signals Calls & Marches to celebrate their show tonight @ The Plaza Club. some other stuff too. Our heartfelt sympathies to The Hotel Lobbyists. the end.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mission Of Burma's The Charm

item.title: September 23 2008
item.description: we pay respects t oEarl Palmer & Norman Whitfield, preview Gonerfest 5 and show off some new tunes from The High Dials, Young Rival and The Girls! listen up!
item.itunes:subtitle: Motown's The Charm

item.title: September 16 2008
item.description: this Friday (the 19th) mateys!! put on yer best buccaneer gear and listen to some swashbucklin' rock 'n' roll! or just lsiten to this show!
item.itunes:subtitle: Talking Like A Pirate's The Charm

item.title: September 9 2008
item.description: started off with a little rant, then calmed down w/ some Stolen Minks, Fucked Up, Eddy Current Suppression Ring and more! tune in why don't you?
item.itunes:subtitle: Feeling Cheated's The Charm

item.title: September 2 2008
item.description: oh man, here we go! back from Wild Weekend and hatin' life...but new stuff from Mean Jeans, Gentleman Jesse & His Men and more madness!
item.itunes:subtitle: School Day's The Charm

item.title: August 26 2008
item.description: preview of this amazing festival in Austin, Texas! it's gonna be a ball, y'all! oh, and some other odds 'n' sods too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Wild Weekend's The Charm

item.title: Aug 19 2008
item.description: some new cuts from the UK label and r'n'r club as well as new stuff from The Strange Boys and The Love Me Nots...dig it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dirty Water's The Charm

item.title: August 12 2008
item.description: a partial funeral mixtape for those inpsired by The Pack A.D.'s new album, also Miss Chain & The Broken Heels and bunch of other goods!
item.itunes:subtitle: Your Funeral's The Charm

item.title: August 5 2008
item.description:
send me your songs to <borninsixtynine@hotmail.com> for a chance to win tix to the Pack AD show Saturday Aug. 16 and we'll play 'em too!
oh yeah, new stuff this week from Twin Crystals, White Lung, The Defektors and more!
Stooges gear stolen! nail those jerks!
item.itunes:subtitle: What's On Your Funeral Mixtape?

item.title: July 29 2008
item.description: new goods from The Parallels, The Famines, The Estranged and a few goof ups too!
item.itunes:subtitle: What The Heck Was That?

item.title: July 22 2008
item.description: holy garage goodness Batman!
item.itunes:subtitle: CiTR Show Swap Week-Kliph from Laugh Tracks takes over

item.title: July 15 2008
item.description: oh boy! still reelin' from last night's King Khan show! managed to play some killer stuff from The Bug Nasties and Digital Leather though as well as other goodies! whoo!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: July 8 2008
item.description: spotlight on the soul man extraordinaire, as well Sub Pop's having a party, and new stuff from Sweet Rot Records! whew!
item.itunes:subtitle: King Khan's The Charm

item.title: July 1 2008
item.description:
celebrating all things Canuck today-tune in and feel the love!
R.I.P. Matt Odietus (Candy Snatchers)
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Day's The Charm

item.title: June 24 2008
item.description: we did it-we finished off our weekly digging of the 7" library!! alo new stuff from Vancougar, The Zip Guns, The Brothers Gross and a heap more! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: June 17 2008
item.description: a salute to wild riders of boards today, as well new jams from The Cadaver Dogs, Jolts and more 7"'s from the vaults! now go outside, fools!
item.itunes:subtitle: Skateboarding's The Charm

item.title: June 10 2008
item.description: yes i know, a week late, but what the heck...also, new Deranged releases, new soul from the pages of Mojo and whatever else i could cram in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bo Diddley's The Charm

item.title: May 27 2008
item.description: ok so we didn't get to talk to the guys, but we still hyped the show this Friday @ The Astoria, plus all kindsa Montreal acts, new stuff from Fear Of Lipstick and The Futureheads and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: No CPC Gangbangs-Boo!

item.title: May 20 2008
item.description: new tracks from Julie Ocean, Invasions, Davila 666 and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: May 13 2008
item.description: debuted tracks from Simply Saucer, The Blank-Its and more ramblings than i care to admit.
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: May 6 2008
item.description: new tricks from We March, Ramblin' Ambassadors and Spectres among others, i was a bit of a mumblemouth too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: April 29 2008
item.description: ok ok here we go...new stuff from The Green Hour Band & Avenue Rose, more Ditrbombs trivia action and a small feature on The Ponderosa Stomp! yeehaa!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Transit System Failed Me Again

item.title: April 22 2008
item.description: new tracks from Teenage Head, King Khan & BBQ and Meth Teeth...contest action and more form the vaults! yowza!
item.itunes:subtitle: DIrtbomb's The Charm

item.title: 14-April-2008
item.description: support your local indie rekkid shop on Saturday April 19th! buy vinyl!! oh yeah, new stuff from Let's Dance, Babyshakes and Monotonix too...
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: April 08 2008
item.description: some birthday songs for my lady, new stuff from The Okmoniks, Danko Jones and The Funhouse compilation, and mucho more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: April 1 2008
item.description: we feature the Akron duo today on the heels of their sold-out show, as well new hits from Be Your Own Pet, The Black & Whites and The Faceless Werewolves! ROAR!
item.itunes:subtitle: Black Key's The Charm

item.title: March 25 2008
item.description: songs this legendary Boston band taught us today, as well as debuts from Dead Ghosts, Chinese Telephones and The Kills. right on!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Lyre's The Charm

item.title: March 18 2008
item.description: yes it's songs the little Tokyo girl group taught us today, as well as more 7"s outta the vaults, and a couple of new Fleshtones tracks!
item.itunes:subtitle: 5.6.7.8's The Charm

item.title: March 4 2008
item.description: what a way to kick off March with new tracks from the Turpentine Brothers and Sweatmaster, 7" madness from the letter "N" and scads more! dig it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Holy Hell Of A Show, Batman!

item.title: Febraury 26 2008
item.description: a profile on The Balck Halos, more 7" from the vaults, new stuff from The Bellrays and a tribute to black rock and roll!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hard Sweet And Sticky

item.title: February 19 2008
item.description: Creepy Creeps, Raveonettes, Dead Meadow, more from the 7" vaults and today is the release of the new Dirtbombs LP! Yippee!
item.itunes:subtitle: These Are Some Good Tunes!

item.title: February 12 2008
item.description: just what has been goin' on down under? tune in as we look back and ahead to the great sounds of Australia's musical dynasty. new stuff from the Antipodean Screams comp, and we also debut Modern Creatures and Vancougar's new releases!
item.itunes:subtitle: Australia's The Charm!

item.title: February 5 2008
item.description: somehow slurred my way through this trainwreck of a show-i think you heard some new Black Halos, Dirtbombs, Thee Attacks and more, but what do i know?
item.itunes:subtitle: I'm A Jerkface!

item.title: January 29 2008
item.description: yeah ok ,so i was a half hour late AND i kept saying the wrong date for the show-so sue me...i still managed to rock your world with brand new Dirtbombs, Statues, Kills and Vapid tracks !! whatcha gonna do?
item.itunes:subtitle: The Snow's The Charm

item.title: January 22 2008
item.description: a smattering of sixties pop and inspired bands today, more 7" madness and live Buzzcocks action!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sixties Pop's The Charm

item.title: January 15 2008
item.description: new tuneage from Miss Chain & The Broken Heels, Jay Reatard & The China Creeps, more 7" vinyl goodness, and we kickstarted our "Name That Jam Tune" contest! tune in next week for more chances to win tix to their show Feb.2 @ Richard's!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Jam's The Charm

item.title: January 8 2008
item.description: hey ho let's go...new stuff from the TVees, The Busy Signals, We Are Wolves, a heap of good shows to check out and we dug through the crates under the letter "I". tune in, turn on, drop dead!
item.itunes:subtitle: New Year's The Charm

item.title: 18 December 2007
item.description:
well our last show for 2007 had us reminiscing about our favourite LP's of the year and we paid our respects to Ike Turner. threw a couple of new chestnuts on the fire from Wooden Shjips, Tyvek and palyed at least one festive tune!
HAPPY HOLIDAYS!! SEE YOU IN 2008!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas Time's The Charm

item.title: 11 December 2007
item.description: loads of 7" vinyl today-some of my picks for 2007, plus we raided the vaults in the letter "H". as well new stuff from The Satelliters, Hell On Heels and The Shitty Limits! one more show to go until 2008!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Wax

item.title: 04 December 2007
item.description: new nuggets from Something Fierce and The Maharajas, a look back at some influential Calgary rock'n'roll courtesy of Th' Legendary Few, a spotlight on Sharon Jones & the Dap Kings, and more vinyl vault 7" wonders!! whew!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Soul

item.title: Third Time's The Charm
item.description: more from the lost era of New Wave, a couple new Deranged Records releases, some 7" ditties under the letter "G" and more!

item.title: 20 November 2007
item.description: new tracks from The Hives, The Raveonettes, The Urges plus a history lesson on New Wave thanks to Mojo Magazine!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Wave

item.title: 13 November 2007
item.description: what's new with you? everything good? well enjoy the show w/ Sudden Infant Dance Syndrome, The Evaporators, and a special birthday shout out for my friend Christa!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 06 November 2007
item.description: loads of new stuff today: Red Dons, C'mon, Tuff Bananas and more!! whoo!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 30 October 2007
item.description:
here's what was played...
artist/title/song
meteors/sewertime blues/i bury the living don hinson & the rigormorticians/monster dance party!/that little old graverobber me fleshtones/hexbreaker!/screaming skull new mayfair dance orchestra/v/a-ghoul-arama/haunted house man...or astro-man?/beyond the black hole/surf terror trashwomen/s/t/dragula 7" munsters/s/t/frankenstein had a hot rod car ventures/s/t/the fourth dimension brains/hell'n'back/blood don hinson & the rigormorticians/monster dance party!/werewolf watusi bauhaus/mask/same forbidden dimension/somebody down there likes me/invisible dimension horrors/strange house/gil sleeping cramps/songs the lord taught us/zombie dance mecht mensch/v/a-spook party/zombie unknown/v/a-sounds of terror!/curse of the zombies 45 grave/a tale of strange phenomena/riboflavin, non-carbonated, poly-unsaturated blood p. xavier atencio & buddy baker/v/a-ghoula-rama/graveyard music woggles/ragged but right/night crawls hoods/gangters & morticians/she put a hex on me unknown/v/a-shock! terror! fear!/who's afraid of weerdo wolf lee ross/v/a-ghoul-arama/the mummy's bracelet robert cobert orchestra/v/a-ghoul-arama/dark shadows untamed youth/an invitation to planet mace/ghost wave ray lande & wade dennis/v/a-spook party/halloween john zacherle/v/a-spook party/happy halloween
BOO!!
**PLEASE NOTE! DUE TO A SERVER ERROR, THERE IS NO AUDIO AVAILABLE FOR THIS EPISODE-IF YOU WANT TO OBTAIN A COPY, PLEASE EMAIL ME AT:borninsixtynine@hotmail.com THANKS!
item.itunes:subtitle: Halloween Spooktacular!!

item.title: 23 October 2007
item.description: mostly stuff from the playlist today, but included The Primordials, White Lung and a bunch of seven inches from the vaults!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 16 October 2007
item.description: ok, other than the records sounding like shite for whatever reason, we still managed to profile The Woggles who return to Vancouver Friday OCt.19 @ Pat's Pub-don't you dare miss it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 09 October 2007
item.description:
a night on the town courtesy of yours truly is what we raffled off today-thanks to Steve, Carol, and Ellen for calling in! lots of Black Lips played too!!
to donate call 604.822.1242 or 604.822.8648 or go on-line at: www.citr.ca/donate to make your pledges!
cheers!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Fundrive part 2

item.title: 02 October 2007
item.description:
that's right! funding drive time! All "Louie Louie" all the time!
to donate call 604.822.1242 or 604.822.8648 or on-line at: www. citr.ca/donate
enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Fundrive!!

item.title: 25 September 2007
item.description: got some stuff of my chest today about The Fucking Eagles being denied entry to Canada and waxed on a current controversy around The Black Lips...debuted Tiny Masters Of Today and Heavy Trash as well...who says rock and roll is just about the music?
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 18 Sept. 2007
item.description: a spotlight on The Chesterfield Kings on the release of their brand new album "Psychedelic Sunrise", new stuff from Sharon Jones & The Dap Kings...we dig through the "D" 7"'s next week!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 11 Sept 2007
item.description: my mouth was running away from me today...but i still managed to debut the new Black Lips, China Creeps and Static Static releases...
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 4 September 2007
item.description: i'm baaaack! no time to talk, just want to rock with the likes of The Bishops, The Coathangers, Riff Randells and lots more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Aug-2007
item.description: Luke Meat tires to full Bryce's pair of Ben Shermans by rockin' The Manvills, The Hitz, Turbonegro, Black Lips, Radio Birdman, and some requests too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Luke Meat Fills In for The Charm!!!

item.title: 31 July 2007
item.description: whoa! got $650,000? Sympathy For The Record Industry is up for sale...we heard Fucked Up live on The Cherry Blossom Clinic (courtesy of WFMU) and we plundered the 7" vaults yet again!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 24 July 2007
item.description: we plunder the vaults for the letter "B", and dig up new stuff from The Gore Gore Girls, Len Price 3 and Johnny Casino & The Secrets!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 17 July 2007
item.description: more debuts from Headquarters, The Shimmys and Snatches Of Pink and we kicked off a new feature: From The Vaults-7" wonders from the CiTR archives!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 10 July 2007
item.description: hey loads of new stuff from the likes of Jay Reatard, Sonic Avenues, The Pointed Sticks and more! hot!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 03 July 2007
item.description: lots of new stuff today-Long Blondes, CPC Gangbangs, Two Hours Traffic and more...huzzah!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 26 June 2007
item.description:
Thee Makeout Party live !! all the way from Anaheim California!!
Dan-vocals, guitar Lee-bass, vocals Sean-guitar,vocals Alex-drums, vocals
check 'em out: myspace.com/theemakeoutparty
special guest appearance by Rockin' Ruby and Mary!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 19 June 2007
item.description: it's the songs of summer today as well as a Pipettes inspired set and other goodies! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 05 June 2007
item.description: a bit dodgy at first, but recovered nicely with a spotlight on The Queers, who hit Vancouver this Saturday June 9 @ The Red Room after nearly a decade since their last time here!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 29 May 2007
item.description: damn its getting hot outside...go check out the Mount Pleasant Festival Saturday June 2!! and listen to some rock 'n' roll!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 22 May 2007
item.description: new stuff from The Youths, Thee Makeout Party and more, plus and a live studio set from The River City Tanlines of WFMU's Cherry Blossom Clinic!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 15 May 2007
item.description: songs The Gruesomes Taught Us on the show today as we celebrate 20 years of the tyrants of teen trash!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 08 May 2007
item.description: holy crap so many shows to see this week! we played some stuff from In The Red Records like Volt, Miss Alex White and others...
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 01 May 2007
item.description: new tracks from Brimstone Howl, Black Tie Revue, Dollhouse and many more! whoa!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 24 April 2007
item.description: new junk from The Ugly Beats, The Breakers and tip o' the hat to Johnny Thunders! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 17 April 2007
item.description: debuted The Willowz, Detroit Cobras and Ripps discs today as well as a host of other rock'n'roll goodness-check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 10 April 2007
item.description: a few tunes to warm up, then it was Songs The Untamed Youth Taught Us! happy 20th anniversary guys!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 3 April 2007
item.description: debuted the new Clorox Girls, Kaiser Chiefs and Queers discs along with other random rock and/or roll! enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 27 March 2007
item.description: another packed show-highlights from the Radio Heartbeat Powerpop festival, along with new stuff from The DT's, Paul Collins Beat an more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third time's The Charm

item.title: 20 March 2007
item.description:
action packed show! we spun some "Ruby" songs for my daughter on the eve of her first birthday, hyped The Husbands show at Pub 340 with a live rebroadcast set from the studios of WFMU, played too many versions of "Communication Breakdown" and more!
to win tickets to the Riverboat Gamblers show on Tuesday March 27 @ The Croatian Cultural Centre email me a photo of you or anyone gambling to: borninsixtynine@hotmail.com for your chance to win!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 13 March 2007
item.description: we debuted new tracks from Mark Sultan, Ladies Night, Purple Wizard and had a live set from The Safes (courtesy of WFMU 's Three Chord Monte)!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 06-March-2007
item.description: our International Womens Day special with all female-friendly rock and/or roll! if you listen closely near the end of the show you'll hear me croaking along to Loretta Lynn and making some other idle chit chat 'cuz i left the mic on!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 27 February 2007
item.description: goodies from The Makes Nice, Gentleman Jesse & His Men, a profile on The Dwarves and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 20 Feb 2007
item.description: new tunes from The Dexateens, The Bloody Hollies, and The Clorox Girls! whoop whoop!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 13-Feb-2007
item.description: sounds abound from I Walk The Line, The Brutal Knights, and The Woggles among others-check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 06-Feb-2007
item.description: new sounds from The Demon's Claws, White Barons, The Bayonettes and more! fuck Myspace!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 30-Jan-2007
item.description: whoa! what a show! we had a musical history lesson from the Detroit Cobras, said our goodbyes to local new-wavers Fun 100 on the eve of their last show ever, and talked to Luke Nuclear, singer of Ottawa, Ontario rock 'n' roll combo The Million Dollar Marxists about their new record and plans for world domination!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 23-Jan-2007
item.description: had a week off but we're back w/This Moment In Black History, The Pink Fits, a nod to Brent Liles (Social Distortion) and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 09-Jan-2007
item.description: new music from The Fe Fi Fo Fums and Manual Scan plus a live studio session from the Mighty Go Go Players on the Cherry Blossom Clinic radio show on WFMU!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 2 January 2007
item.description: first show of the new year! we paid our respects to James Brown, debuted stuff from The Towers of London and Nikki Corvette and had a live set from The Husbands on WFMU's Cherry Blossom Clinic!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 12 Dec-2006
item.description: my last show of 2006! a few new things from the likes of Million Dollar Marxists and Beat Beat Beat, some of my fave albums of this year, along with a holiday dinner "cooked" by some rock'n'roll friends and Christmas tunes galore! hohoho!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 05-Dec-2006
item.description: my buddy Dale's birthday show! only one screw up! hooray!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 21-Nov-2006
item.description:
funding drive show #2! we had live sets from The Goodnight Lovin' and The Night Terrors outta Milwuakee WI! check out the GNL's new disc on Dusty Medical Records and the Night Terror's new one on Big Neck! Tony proposed to his wife on air! and she said yes!!
GNL=Austin (drums) Andy (guitar/vocals) Colin(guitar/vocals) Zach (bass) Harris(keys)
Night Terrors are Tony and Kevin (guitars) and Eric (drums).
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 14 November 2006
item.description: funding drive show! we played some excerpts from old shows and profiled the Festival Of Guns!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 07-Nov-2006
item.description: new stuff from The Clorox Girls and the DT's, a preview of Budget Rock Showcase V in Oakland, Ca. and a live set (courtesy of our pals at the Cherry Blossom Clinic on WFMU) from The Brimstones!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 31 Oct ober 2006
item.description:
our Halloween spooktacular! here's what was played:
artist/album/song
satan's pilgrims/soul pilgrim/haunted house of rock fallouts/v/a-the funhouse comp thing/haunted house hoodoo gurus/stoneage romeos/dig it up screamin' jay hawkins/split w/ esquerita/i hear voices dead moon/echoes of the past/walkin' on my grave mighty caesars/nothing can stop these men/the grim reaper los straitjackets/twist party/all back to drac's hi-risers/rockin' spree/call me the wolfman billy lee riley/v/a-this is sun rockabilly/flying saucer rock and roll sonics/full force!/strychnine beguiled/blue dirge/imp of satan bloodshot bill/v/a-zombie night in canada/monsters everywhere frank rondell/s/t/the bat cramps/songs the lord taught us/i was a teenage werewolf & sunglasses after dark priscillas/s/t/all my friends are zombies los reactors/dead in the suburbs/be a zombie curtis & the creeps/s/t/the thing rex garvin & the mighty cravers/v/a-come and get it!/ strange happenings vibes/what's inside?/footsteps flat duo jets/go go harlem baby/stalkin' birthday party/s/t/release the bats forbidden dimension/somebody down there likes me/crawling eye morlochs/emerge!/in the cellar famous monsters/in the night!/f is for fiend neanderthals/the latest menace to the human race/2000 lb. werewolf deadcats/feline 500/frank-n-stein shuffle frantics/s/t/werewolf cheater slicks/s/t/possession king khan & bbq show/what's for dinner?/zombies young savages/s/t/the invaders are coming screamin' lord sutch/hands of jack the ripper/same shaggs/philosophy of the world/it's halloween
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 24 October 2006
item.description: ok, not as many requests as i'd hoped, but we still managed a great show w/ the likes of Big Sandy & His Fly-Rite Boys, The Subatomics and a live set (courtesy of WFMU's Cherry Blossom Clinic) from The Defectors!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 17-October-2006
item.description: more new goodies from the likes of The Hi-Risers, The Ettes and Some Action, a profile on Deranged Records plus lots more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 10 October 2006
item.description: it's a European invasion! rock and roll from across the Atlantic! plus new stuff from The Buffalo Killers, Tijuana Bibles and more! whoot!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm

item.title: 3 October 2006
item.description: we pop our podcast cherry with new stuff from Dead Moon, The Black Keys, a live set from The Nice Boys (courtesy of WFMU's Cherry Blossom Clinic) and lots more! dig it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Third Time's The Charm
